sentences.en: A second hand car dealer will always look at the bodywork rather than the engine.
sentences.cn: 二手车车商总是会更加注重车身外观而非引擎。

sentences.en: Beneath bodywork, It'soon becomes clear that it is not the genuine article.
sentences.cn: 透过车身, 很快就会发现它并非真材实料.

sentences.en: He accused the garage of shoddy workmanship on the bodywork.
sentences.cn: 他指责汽车修理厂车身修理工艺拙劣.

sentences.en: It is one of the cheapest cars on the market, with tinny bodywork.
sentences.cn: 那是市场上最廉价的汽车之一，车身用劣质金属制成。

sentences.en: It's an old car and its bodywork is rusty.
sentences.cn: 那是一辆旧车,它的整个车身都生锈了.

sentences.en: Monteiro a series of stops before retiring with bodywork and radiator damage.
sentences.cn: 蒙泰罗在因为车体和散热器损伤退赛之前进了许多次站.

sentences.en: Non - structural parts of suspension members are considered bodywork.
sentences.cn: 悬挂系统 非 结构上的部分被看成车体.

sentences.en: The bodywork of this old car hardly holds together.
sentences.cn: 这部旧汽车的车身几乎要脱落开了.

sentences.en: The bodywork structure is the main load - bearing body in the well car.
sentences.cn: 承载体是落下孔车中的主要承载件,其设计的优劣将直接影响落下孔车的性能.

sentences.en: The bodywork was designed and manufactured by CMB with wooden frame work.
sentences.cn: 车厢以木制支框构成,是中巴自行设计及制作.

sentences.en: The car's bodywork scarcely holds together.
sentences.cn: 这汽车的车身简直都要散架了.

sentences.en: The car's bodywork was already showing signs of deterioration.
sentences.cn: 这辆车的车身已经显示出了劣化迹象.

sentences.en: The first is a new nose, front wing and some bodywork modifications.
sentences.cn: 首先是个新鼻子, 前翼和其他车体部件的更新.

sentences.en: There isn't much metal in the bodywork of this new car; it's mainly plastic.
sentences.cn: 这辆新汽车的车身没用多少金属材料, 大部分是塑料的.

sentences.en: We repainted the bodywork of the bus.
sentences.cn: 我们把大客车的外部重新油漆了一遍.

trans.tran_cn: （汽车的）车身，修理车身，塑身、纤体（如：按摩、瑜伽、锻炼等可以放松心情的方法，以达到促进身体和精神状况的目的。）
trans.tran_en: the metal frame of a vehicle, not including the engine, wheels etc
